content.rendered:
The Avengers and Earth face a greater threat than ever before, a new threat emerging from the cosmic shadows, Thanos, who is determined to obtain all six infinity stones and gain unlimited power. All of the Avengers’ battles have led to this moment – Earth, and the fate of existence, has never been more uncertain than it is now.

Directors: Anthony Russo. Joe Russo

Writers: Christopher Markus. Stephen McFeely. Stan Lee

Stars: Robert Downey Jr. Chris Hemsworth. Mark Ruffalo
